name: OneWater Marine, Inc.
description: OneWater Marine, Inc. is a leading retailer and service provider in the recreational boating industry, specializing in the sales of new and used boats, service, and accessories. Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Buford, Georgia, the company operates through a network of dealerships across the United States. OneWater Marine offers a diverse range of boats including luxury yachts, fishing boats, and personal watercraft from top manufacturers such as Boston Whaler, Sea Ray, and Yamaha. In addition to boat sales, OneWater Marine is committed to providing exceptional customer service, offering financing options, insurance, and a comprehensive suite of maintenance and repair services. The company aims to enhance the boating experience for its customers by providing high-quality products and expert knowledge. With a strong focus on community engagement and sustainability, OneWater Marine also promotes responsible boating practices and environmental stewardship. As a public company listed on the NASDAQ, OneWater Marine is dedicated to growth through strategic acquisitions and partnerships within the marine industry, while continually striving to meet the evolving needs of boaters across the nation.
ceo: Kurt W. W. W. C. P. M. A.

key_executives.name: Kurt W. W. W. C. P. M. A.
